content.rendered:
Fastjet Plc (LSE:FJET) is a British/South African-based holding company for a group of low-cost carriers that operate in Africa. The company’s stated aim is to become the continent’s first low-cost, pan-African airline, and the operation was initially created with the acquisition of Fly540, an airline operating in East Africa; flights in Fastjet’s own name commenced in November 2012 in Tanzania.

 

Fastjet Baggage

Queries handled by Fastjet Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class

List of Fastjet Offices:

Mozambique – Aeroporto De Escritorio
Mozambique – Andar
Mozambique – Aeroporto De Tete
Mozambique – Aeroporto Da Beira
Mozambique – Aeroporto De Nampula
Mozambique – Tambo International Airport
Tanzania – Dar Es Salaam
Tanzania – Samora Avenue, Dar Es Salaam
Tanzania – Mwanza
Tanzania – Arusha
Tanzania – Tanzania
Zambia – Lusaka
Zambia – Rhodes Park, Lusaka
Zimbabwe – Harare
Zimbabwe – Belgravia, Harare
Zimbabwe – R. G. Mugabe International Airport, Harare
Zimbabwe – Phillips Ave, Harare 
Zimbabwe – International Terminal, Harare 
Zimbabwe – Domestic Terminal, Harare 
Zimbabwe – Victoria Falls

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Fastjet Offices Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Fastjet Offices: (click on the stars below)
